text1: <pad> chatGPT can write and debug computer programs, mimic the style of celebrity CEOs and write business pitches. it can also write music, teleplays, fairy tales and student essays. ChatGPT's training data includes man pages and information about internet phenomena and programming languages such as bulletin board systems and the Python programming language. it can also play games like tic-tac-toe and simulate an ATM.</s>

text3: ChatGPT can write and debug computer programs. It can also mimic the style of celebrity CEOs and write business pitches. ChatGPT's training data includes man pages and information about internet phenomena. Unlike most chatbots, it remembers a limited number of previous prompts given to it in the same conversation.
text4:
Although the core function of a chatbot is to mimic a human conversationalist, ChatGPT is versatile. [18] ChatGPT's training data includes man pages and information about internet phenomena and programming languages such as bulletin board systems and the Python programming language. [18]

In comparison to its predecessor, InstructGPT, ChatGPT attempts to reduce harmful and deceitful responses. [7]

Unlike most chatbots, ChatGPT remembers a limited number of previous prompts given to it in the same conversation. Journalists have speculated that this will allow ChatGPT to be used as a personalized therapist.
